Class DatabaseMessageSource

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends org.springframework.context.support.AbstractMessageSource

      • DefaultUltimateFallbackLocale

        public static final Locale DefaultUltimateFallbackLocale
        Locale constant being set as default ultimate fall-back locale.
        This constant value is the Locale object returned by Locale.getDefault() method.

      • getLocaleFallbackHandler

        protected LocaleFallbackHandlerCase getLocaleFallbackHandler()
        Getter for LocaleFallbackHandlerCase object being used to resolve fall-back locale.
        Thread safety: indirectly unsafe - this method self is thread safe but returned object may not be.
        Returns:
        LocaleFallbackHandlerCase object being used to resolve fall-back locale.

      • setLocaleFallbackHandler

        public void setLocaleFallbackHandler(LocaleFallbackHandlerCase localeFallbackHandler)
        Setter of LocaleFallbackHandlerCase object being used to resolve fall-back locale.
        Thread safety: indirectly unsafe - this method self is thread safe but LocaleFallbackHandlerCase object as argument needs to be assured of its thread safety (externally) for whole life cycle of this object. Means given LocaleFallbackHandlerCase object as argument won't be cloned in this method.
        Parameters:
        localeFallbackHandler -
